frames.name: DR. BOB
frames.text: Welcome to DR. BOB: BIG SHIFT! v.0.9! Press E or Enter to advance the dialogue.

frames.name: DR. BOB
frames.text: In this game, you'll guide me through a series of levels which are beaten by touching the goal.

frames.name: DR. BOB
frames.text: Use WASD to move, and press E to shift your perspective.

frames.name: DR. BOB
frames.text: Also, I know this is pretty boring and dry, but in the final game there will actually be a story, I promise.

frames.name: DR. BOB
frames.text: But for now, this is all I got. Enjoy!
